long_description: Just the right design for sleeping comfort, the asymmetrical Exped Air Pillow provides comfortable head support for side and back sleepers. Features 2 low-profile, FlatValves for inflation and deflation; easily inflates with a few hearty breaths. Intake valve features a built-in flap to prevent air escaping when inflating; flap can be released to let a little air out when looking for that ideal comfort zone. Soft polyester tricot fabric is comfortable next to skin. 1 end is taller than the other to accommodate different head positions; indented in the middle for the contours of your head. Includes stuff sack for protection during transportation. Exped Air Pillow packs down to a compact travel size; Medium: 2 x 5 in.; Large: 2 x 5.5 in.; Extra Large: 2 x 6 in.
short_description: Just the right design for sleeping comfort, the asymmetrical Exped Air Pillow provides comfortable head support for side and back sleepers.
